DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy safety circumferential pulmonary vein isolation without contact force pulmonary vein antrum modification patient paroxysmal atrial fibrillation .
DOC.brief_title: The Comparison Between PVAM CPVI Patients PAF
DOC.detailed_description: This single centre , prospective control study . The study enroll 180 patient 2:1 grouped .
